summary: This forensic report from ABC Forensic Services Laboratory details the comparison of fired cartridge cases related to a Bramblewood County Sheriff's Office case. The examination concluded that a cartridge case collected from a crime scene and a test cartridge case fired from a Glock 17 pistol were fired by the same firearm. The Glock 17 pistol itself was not used in this examination.
conclusion: The examination determined that the cartridge case CW-8A and the test cartridge case BCSO-3.5 were fired by the same firearm.

description: Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19 mm caliber (S/N: obliterated)
Unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
Laboratory test cartridge case fired by Item BCSO-3 (Glock 17 pistol)
Fired bronze and silver in color cartridge case (headstamp: 9mm Luger), collected from floor near decedent
